description:
The Pool Mash-Up from the movie soundtrack of "Pitch Perfect". Originally performed and recorded by the Bellas.

I was commissioned to transcribe this piece for the All-Women's A Cappella group, PhenomeNonet in October of 2012. 

All copyright belongs to the original creators of this piece. Please do not steal.
title: The Pool Mash-Up

ms3_metadata.copyright:

metadata.composer:

"Just a Dream": Nelly
Thani Abuhamad (1995-Present)
metadata.lyrics:
Her eyes, her eyes make the stars look like they aren't shinin'. Her hair, her hair falls perfectly without her tryin'. She's so beautiful, and I tell her ev'ryday. I know I know when I compliment her she won't believe me! It's so, It's so, sad to think that she don't see what I see. But ev'rytime she asks me "Do I look okkay?", I say; When I see your face! (face) There's not a thing that I would change! Because you're amazzing just the way you are! When I see your face! There's not a thing that I would change! Because you're amazing just the way you are! When I see your face! 

Do do do do do do do do do do do do do do do do do do do do do do do do do do do do do do do do do do do do do do do do do do do do do do do do do do do do do do do do do do do do do do do do do do do do do do do do do do do do do do do do do do do do do do do do do do do do do do do do do do do do do do do do do do do do do do do do do do do do do do do do do do do do do So travel back down that road. "Will she come back?"; No one knows. It was only just a dream! It was only just a dream! do do do do do do do do do do do do do do do do do do do do do do do do do do do do do do do do do do do face! 

do do do do do do do do do do do do do do do do do do do do do do do do do do do do do do do do do do do do do do do do do do do do do do do do do do do do do do do do do do do do do do do do do do do do do do do do do do do do do do do do do do do do do do do do do do do do do do do do do do do do do do do do do do do do do do do do do do do do do do do do do do do do do do do do do do do do do do do do do do do do do do do do do do do do do do do do do do do do do do do do do do do do do do do do do do do do do do do do do do do do do do do do do do do do do do do do do do do do do do do do I see your face! There's not a thing I would change! You are amazing just the way you are! face! 

oo ah (ah) (ah) ah! ah! (ah) (ah) (ah) (ah) I see your face! There's not a thing I would change! You are amazing just the way you are! So travel back down that road. "Will she come back?": No one knows. Open my eyes, it was only just a dream! (dream) It was only just a dream! face! 

oo (oo) do do do do do do do do do do do do do do do do do do do do do do do do do do do do do do do dm dm dm dm dm dm dm dm dm dm dm dm dm dm dm dm dm dm dm dm dm dm dm dm dm dm dm dm dm dm dm dm dm dm dm dm dm dm dm dm dm dm dm dm dm dm dm dm dm dm dm dm dm dm dm dm dm dm dm dm dm dm dm dm dm dm dm dm dm dm dm dm dm dm dm dm dm dm dm dm dm dm dm dm dm dm dm dm dm dm dm dm face!
